import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./MovieForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieForm=_ref=>{let{movie,onSave,onCancel}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({title:'',director:'',casting:'',releaseYear:'',description:''});// Update form when movie prop changes
useEffect(()=>{if(movie){setFormData({title:movie.title||'',director:movie.director||'',casting:movie.casting||'',releaseYear:movie.releaseYear||'',description:movie.description||''});}else{// Reset form when adding a new movie
setFormData({title:'',director:'',casting:'',releaseYear:'',description:''});}},[movie]);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:name==='releaseYear'?parseInt(value,10)||'':value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();// Validate form data
if(!formData.title||!formData.director||!formData.releaseYear){alert('Please fill in all required fields');return;}onSave(formData);// Reset form
if(!movie){setFormData({title:'',director:'',casting:'',releaseYear:'',description:''});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"movie-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"title",children:"Title*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"title",name:"title",value:formData.title,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"director",children:"Director*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"director",name:"director",value:formData.director,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"casting",children:"Cast"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"casting",name:"casting",value:formData.casting,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"releaseYear",children:"Release Year*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"releaseYear",name:"releaseYear",value:formData.releaseYear,onChange:handleChange,min:"1900",max:new Date().getFullYear(),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"description",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"description",name:"description",value:formData.description,onChange:handleChange,rows:"4"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"save-button",children:movie?'Update Movie':'Add Movie'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"cancel-button",onClick:onCancel,children:"Cancel"})]})]});};export default MovieForm;
